byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, and Ellen Barry from New Delhi.
byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and ELLEN BARRY

abstract: Unidentified gunmen open fire on Shiite mosque in northern Bangladesh, killing one man and injuring three others; twitter account linked to Islamic State claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen opened fire during evening prayers at the mosque, killing one person and wounding three, in the second recent attack on Bangladesh’s tiny Shiite population.

headline.main: Gunmen Strike Shiite Mosque in Bangladesh
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Strike Shiite Mosque in Bangladesh

snippet: Gunmen opened fire during evening prayers at the mosque, killing one person and wounding three, in the second recent attack on Bangladesh’s tiny Shiite population.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
